TEXT.English: Your %s1_unit has been promoted to %s2_promotion in battle.
TEXT.French: Your %s1_unit has been promoted to %s2_promotion in battle.
TEXT.German: Die Einheit %s1_unit hat im Kampf die Beförderung %s2_promotion erlangt.
TEXT.Italian: Your %s1_unit has been promoted to %s2_promotion in battle.
TEXT.Spanish: Tu %s1_unit ha sido ascensado a %s2_promotion en la batalla.

TEXT.Italian: Forme di governo e Religioni preferite

TEXT.Spanish: Desafío - Impulso de Maná para IA

TEXT.English: The AI has access to additional mana resources. Amount depends on difficulty setting.
TEXT.French: The AI has access to additional mana resources. Amount depends on difficulty setting.
TEXT.German: Die KI hat Zugang zu weiteren Mana Resourcen. Anzahl hängt vom Schwierigkeitsgrad ab.
TEXT.Italian: The AI has access to additional mana resources. Amount depends on difficulty setting.
TEXT.Spanish: La IA tiene aceso a recursos adicionales de maná. La cantidad depende en el nuvel de dificultad.

TEXT.English: The Palace provides additional mana and there are more mana nodes on the map.
TEXT.French: The Palace provides additional mana and there are more mana nodes on the map.
TEXT.German: Der Palast gibt zusätzliches Mana und es existieren mehr Mana-Knoten auf der Karte.
TEXT.Italian: The Palace provides additional mana and there are more mana nodes on the map.
TEXT.Spanish: El palacio da maná adicional y hay más nodos de maná en la mapa.
Hechizos de Terraformación tienen más efectos

TEXT.English: Improvements have no Technology Requirement, only take longer to build without the Technology
TEXT.French: Improvements have no Technology Requirement, only take longer to build without the Technology
TEXT.German: Verbesserungen haben keine Technologie Voraussetzung, brauchen nur länger um gebaut zu werden ohne die Technologie
TEXT.Italian: Improvements have no Technology Requirement, only take longer to build without the Technology
TEXT.Spanish: Mejoras no requieren una tecnología, pero se necesita más tiempo para construirlas

TEXT.English: Victor of a Battle gains some culture from the plot
TEXT.German: Sieger einer Schlacht erhält einen Teil der Kultur des Feldes

TEXT.English: Challenge- The Awakening of the Dragons
TEXT.French: Challenge- The Awakening of the Dragons
TEXT.Italian: Challenge- The Awakening of the Dragons

TEXT.French: Dragons spawn later in the game
TEXT.German: Drachen suchen später im Spiel Erebus heim

TEXT.Spanish: Dragones se generan mas tarde en el juego

TEXT.French: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 a %d2 pièces d'or disponible pour le commerce.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 ha %d2 oro disponibile per il commercio.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 tiene %d2 de oro disponible para el comercio.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 tiene %d2 de oro por turno disponible para el comercio.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 will grow to size %d2 on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 crescerà a grandezza %d2 al prossimo turno.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 will shrink to size %d2 on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 retrécira à la taille %d2 au prochain tour.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 schrumpft nächste Runde auf %d2.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 si ridurrà a grandezza %d2 al prossimo turno.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 se reducirá tamaño %d2 el próximo turno.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 will become unhealthy on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 wird nächste Runde krank.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 se volverá insalubre el próximo turno.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%s1 will become healthy on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 wird nächste Runde gesund.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%s1 se volverá sano el próximo turno.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 will become unhappy on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 wird nächste Runde unzufrieden.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 se volverá infeliz el próximo turno.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%s1 will become happy on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 wird nächste Runde zufrieden.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%s1 se volverá feliz el próximo turno.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%s1 will be pacified on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%s1 sera apaisée sur le prochain tour.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Die Unruhen in %s1 werden nächste Runde enden.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%s1 será pacificado en la vuelta siguiente.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 can hurry %s2 for %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] with %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] overflow and +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] for %d5 turns.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 peut précipiter %s2 pour %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] avec %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] de débordement et +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] por %d5 tour.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 kann das Bauprojekt "%s2" unter Einsatz von %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] beschleunigen (Überschuss: %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION]), wobei für %d5 Runden +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] in der Stadt verursacht wird.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 può accelerare %s2 per %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] con un surplus di %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] e 1[ICON_UNHAPPY] per %d5 turni.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 puede acelerar %s2 para %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] con %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] de desbordamiento y +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] para %d5 turnos.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 can hurry %s2 for %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] with %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] overflow, %d6[ICON_GOLD] added to the treasury, and +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] for %d5 turns.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 can hurry %s2 for %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] with %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] overflow, %d6[ICON_GOLD] added to the treasury, and +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] for %d5 turns.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 kann das Bauprojekt "%s2" unter Einsatz von %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] beschleunigen (Überschuss: %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] + %d6[ICON_GOLD] für die Staatskasse), wobei für %d5 Runden +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] in der Stadt verursacht wird.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 può accelerare %s2 per %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] con un surplus di %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION], un aumento del tesoro di %d6[ICON_GOLD] e +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] per %d5 turni.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 puede acelerar %s2 para %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] con un surplus de %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION], %d6[ICON_GOLD] añadido al tesoro, y +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] para %d5 turnos.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.German: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 kann das Bauprojekt "%s2" unter Einsatz von %d3[ICON_GOLD] beschleunigen.[COLOR_REVERT]
[COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 kann das Bauprojekt "%s2" unter Einsatz von %d3[ICON_STONE] beschleunigen.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_MAGENTA]The borders of %s1 are about to expand.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_MAGENTA]La frontière culturelle de %s1's est sur le point de s'étendre.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_MAGENTA]Die Stadtgrenzen von %s1 werden sich in der nächsten Runde erweitern.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_MAGENTA]Il confine culturale di %s1 sta per espandersi.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.Italian: %s1_Player ha fondato %s2_City in una terra lontana.
TEXT.Spanish: %s1_Player ha fundado %s2_City en una tierra lejana.

TEXT.German: Drücken Sie [ALT-X], um den MapFinder zu beenden.
TEXT.Spanish: Presione el Alt-X-X para parar MapFinder.
Invalid. De la Trayectoria De MapFinder.
Archivo de la regla no encontrado.

TEXT.French: Chemin de Sauvegarde de MapFinder invalide.
TEXT.German: MapFinder: Dateipfad zum Speichern ist ungültig.
TEXT.Italian: Percorso del save file di MapFinder non valido
TEXT.Spanish: MapFinder Ahorra A Invalid De la Trayectoria Del Archivo.
El comando Alt-X recieved. El parar...

TEXT.English: Enter number of turns until reminder goes off and reminder text.
TEXT.French: Notez le nombre de tours jusqu'à ce que le rappel se passe et le texte du rappel.
TEXT.German: Geben Sie die Anzahl der Runden an, bis die Erinnerung angezeigt werden soll.
TEXT.Italian: Inserisci il numero di turni necessari per visualizzare il promemoria.
TEXT.Spanish: Incorpore el número de vueltas hasta que se apaga el recordatorio y texto del recordatorio.

TEXT.English: Also makes invisible units within 2 tiles visible.
TEXT.French: Also makes invisible units within 2 tiles visible.
TEXT.German: Zusätzlich werden alle Einheiten im Radius von 2 Feldern sichtbar.
TEXT.Italian: Also makes invisible units within 2 tiles visible.
TEXT.Spanish: También hace que unidades invisibles dentro de 2 cuadrados se devengan visible.

TEXT.English: Creates a Tree of Life building in city that provides +10 Food, +5 Health and +5 Happiness. Units created in city start with the Touch of Life promotion.
TEXT.French: Creates a Tree of Life building in city that provides +10 Food, +5 Health and +5 Happiness. Units created in city start with the Touch of Life promotion.
TEXT.German: Beschwört einen Baum des Lebens in der Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: Creates a Tree of Life building in city that provides +10 Food, +5 Health and +5 Happiness. Units created in city start with the Touch of Life promotion.
TEXT.Spanish: Crea un Árbol de Vida en la ciudad que proveer de +10 Comida, +5 Salud y +5 Felicidad. Unidades creados en esta ciudad empiece con la promoción de Toca de Vida.

TEXT.English: Use the Holy Avenger to smite forces of darkness.
TEXT.French: Use the Holy Avenger to smite forces of darkness.
TEXT.German: Use the Holy Avenger to smite forces of darkness.
TEXT.Italian: Use the Holy Avenger to smite forces of darkness.
TEXT.Spanish: Utilice el Vengador Santo para golpear las fuerzas de las tinieblas.

TEXT.English: Available only to those that have mastered all 4 elements, the Shooting Stars spell summons stars of energy that the caster can hurl at their enemies.
TEXT.French: Available only to units that have mastered all 4 elements, the Shooting Stars spell summons stars of energy that the caster can hurl at their enemies.
TEXT.German: Available only to units that have mastered all 4 elements, the Shooting Stars spell summons stars of energy that the caster can hurl at their enemies.
TEXT.Italian: Available only to units that have mastered all 4 elements, the Shooting Stars spell summons stars of energy that the caster can hurl at their enemies.
TEXT.Spanish: Disponible solamente a las unidades que han dominado todos los 4 elementos, el hechizo de la Estrella Fugaz envoca estrellas de energía que el mago puede lanzar a sus enemigos.

TEXT.English: Collateral damage: 60% up to 90% max, affects 2 units.
TEXT.French: Collateral damage: 60% up to 90% max, affects 2 units.
TEXT.German: Collateral damage: 60% up to 90% max, affects 2 units.
TEXT.Italian: Collateral damage: 60% up to 90% max, affects 2 units.
TEXT.Spanish: Daños colaterales: 60% a 90% máximum, aflige 2 unidades.

TEXT.English: The Tree of Life can cast the Tree of Life spell in cities to provide certain bonuses.
TEXT.French: The Tree of Life can cast the Tree of Life spell in cities to provide certain bonuses.
TEXT.German: The Tree of Life can cast the Tree of Life spell in cities to provide certain bonuses.
TEXT.Italian: The Tree of Life can cast the Tree of Life spell in cities to provide certain bonuses.
TEXT.Spanish: El Árbol de Vida puede hacer el hechizo de Árbol de Vida en las ciudades para proveer ciertos pluses.

TEXT.English: A Vyrkul is an ancient wizard who transformed himself into an elemental king through rituals that have long been lost in the sands of time. He can only be summoned by those with an unprecedented knowledge of the elements and the arcane.
TEXT.French: A Vyrkul is an ancient wizard who transformed himself into an elemental king through rituals that have long been lost in the sands of time. He can only be summoned by those with an unprecedented knowledge of the elements and the arcane.
TEXT.German: A Vyrkul is an ancient wizard who transformed himself into an elemental king through rituals that have long been lost in the sands of time. He can only be summoned by those with an unprecedented knowledge of the elements and the arcane.
TEXT.Italian: A Vyrkul is an ancient wizard who transformed himself into an elemental king through rituals that have long been lost in the sands of time. He can only be summoned by those with an unprecedented knowledge of the elements and the arcane.
TEXT.Spanish: Un Vyrkul es un mago anciano quien se transformó al rey elemental por rituales que se han perdido en la arena de tiempo. Solamente uno con un conocimiento sin precedente de los elementos y el arcano puede evocarlo.

TEXT.English: It takes 7 turns to summon a Vyrkul.
TEXT.French: It takes 7 turns to summon a Vyrkul.
TEXT.German: Es benötigt 7 Runden um einen Vyrkul zu beschwören.
TEXT.Italian: It takes 7 turns to summon a Vyrkul.
TEXT.Spanish: Se necesita 7 turnos para evocar un Vyrkul.

TEXT.English: Prevents non-team units of less than Level 4 from entering tile
TEXT.French: Prevents non-team units of less than Level 4 from entering tile
TEXT.German: Prevents non-team units of less than Level 4 from entering tile
TEXT.Italian: Prevents non-team units of less than Level 4 from entering tile
TEXT.Spanish: Impide que unidades de otras civilizaciones que son menos de nivel 4 entren el cuadrado

TEXT.English: The walls of Cervedes remained unbreachable by the massed horde of the Clan - a shimmering field preventing their approach.
TEXT.French: The walls of Cervedes remained unbreachable by the massed horde of the Clan - a shimmering field preventing their approach.
TEXT.German: The walls of Cervedes remained unbreachable by the massed horde of the Clan - a shimmering field preventing their approach.
TEXT.Italian: The walls of Cervedes remained unbreachable by the massed horde of the Clan - a shimmering field preventing their approach.
TEXT.Spanish: Las paredes de Cevedes se quedaban impenetrables por la horde del Clan - un campo rielante impidiendo su llegada.

TEXT.English: The Wall of Force prevents any unit of less than Level 4 from attacking or entering the city, unless they are team-mates of the city's owner. This can prevent large stacks of weak troops from breaking down your defenders, though the field only lasts so long as the archmage remains in the city - beware of highly promoted assassins.
TEXT.French: The Wall of Force prevents any unit of less than Level 4 from attacking or entering the city, unless they are team-mates of the city's owner. This can prevent large stacks of weak troops from breaking down your defenders, though the field only lasts so long as the archmage remains in the city - beware of highly promoted assassins.
TEXT.German: The Wall of Force prevents any unit of less than Level 4 from attacking or entering the city, unless they are team-mates of the city's owner. This can prevent large stacks of weak troops from breaking down your defenders, though the field only lasts so long as the archmage remains in the city - beware of highly promoted assassins.
TEXT.Italian: The Wall of Force prevents any unit of less than Level 4 from attacking or entering the city, unless they are team-mates of the city's owner. This can prevent large stacks of weak troops from breaking down your defenders, though the field only lasts so long as the archmage remains in the city - beware of highly promoted assassins.
TEXT.Spanish: La Pared de Fuerza impide que una unidad menos de nivel 4 ataque o entre la ciudad, a menos que sea en el equipo del dueño de la ciudad. Esta puede impedir que apilamientos grandes de tropas débiles quebren tus defensores, aunque queda solamente mientras el arcmago queda en la ciudad - ¡cuidado con asesinos ascendidos!

TEXT.English: Growth creates a temporary effect (represented as a building) in the city which remains until the caster leaves. It increases the amount of food kept upon population growth as well as offering dramatic health benefits.
TEXT.French: Growth creates a temporary effect (represented as a building) in the city which remains until the caster leaves. It increases the amount of food kept upon population growth as well as offering dramatic health benefits.
TEXT.German: Growth creates a temporary effect (represented as a building) in the city which remains until the caster leaves. It increases the amount of food kept upon population growth as well as offering dramatic health benefits.
TEXT.Italian: Growth creates a temporary effect (represented as a building) in the city which remains until the caster leaves. It increases the amount of food kept upon population growth as well as offering dramatic health benefits.
TEXT.Spanish: Crecimiento crea un efecto temporal (representado como edificio) en la ciudad que queda hasta que sale el mago. Aumenta la cantidad de comida al crecer la población, y también proporciona beneficios dramáticos de salud.

TEXT.English: The Birth spell allows rapid growth of new cities - upto a maximum size of 8. The new population must be maintainable and will consume food as normal however, so planning ahead is advised. This can be incredibly useful when combined with certain races or civics that allow population to be traded for other benefits - though be wary of unhappiness that may arise from overuse of these methods.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The spell cannot be used in cities belonging to Fallow players.
TEXT.French: The Birth spell allows rapid growth of new cities - upto a maximum size of 8. The new population must be maintainable and will consume food as normal however, so planning ahead is advised. This can be incredibly useful when combined with certain races or civics that allow population to be traded for other benefits - though be wary of unhappiness that may arise from overuse of these methods.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The spell cannot be used in cities belonging to Fallow players.
TEXT.German: The Birth spell allows rapid growth of new cities - upto a maximum size of 8. The new population must be maintainable and will consume food as normal however, so planning ahead is advised. This can be incredibly useful when combined with certain races or civics that allow population to be traded for other benefits - though be wary of unhappiness that may arise from overuse of these methods.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The spell cannot be used in cities belonging to Fallow players.
TEXT.Italian: The Birth spell allows rapid growth of new cities - upto a maximum size of 8. The new population must be maintainable and will consume food as normal however, so planning ahead is advised. This can be incredibly useful when combined with certain races or civics that allow population to be traded for other benefits - though be wary of unhappiness that may arise from overuse of these methods.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The spell cannot be used in cities belonging to Fallow players.
TEXT.Spanish: El hechizo Nacimiento permite crecimiento rápido de nuevas ciudades - al máximo de tamaño 8. La población nueva tiene que ser sostenible y consumirá la comida como normal, así que hay que planear por adelentado. Este puede ser muy útil en combinación con ciertos razas o civics that allow population to be traded for other benefits - though be wary of unhappiness that may arise from overuse of these methods.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The spell cannot be used in cities belonging to Fallow players.

TEXT.English: The fertility spell allows you to swap one type of grain or animal resource for another, allowing you to gain maximum benefit from the resources.
TEXT.French: The fertility spell allows you to swap one type of grain or animal resource for another, allowing you to gain maximum benefit from the resources.
TEXT.German: The fertility spell allows you to swap one type of grain or animal resource for another, allowing you to gain maximum benefit from the resources.
TEXT.Italian: The fertility spell allows you to swap one type of grain or animal resource for another, allowing you to gain maximum benefit from the resources.
TEXT.Spanish: El hechizo de fertilidad permite que cambie un tipo de grano o animal por otro, permitiendo que ganes el beneficio máximo de los recursos.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Converts Grain and Animal resources to a different type
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Converts Grain and Animal resources to a different type
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]konvertiert Getreide und Tier Resourcen zu einem anderen Typ
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Converts Grain and Animal resources to a different type
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Convirte Recursos de Grano y Animal a otro tipo

TEXT.English: This order tells the Unit to use its spells to improve the countryside. If it has Spring, it will turn deserts to plains, if it can scorch, it will turn snow lands to tundra. It will also attempt to sanctify hell terrain.
TEXT.French: This order tells the Unit to use its spells to improve the countryside. If it has Spring, it will turn deserts to plains, if it can scorch, it will turn snow lands to tundra. It will also attempt to sanctify hell terrain.
TEXT.German: Dieser Befehl lässt die Einheit Zaubersprüche, welche die Landschaft verbessern, automatisch benutzen.
TEXT.Italian: This order tells the Unit to use its spells to improve the countryside. If it has Spring, it will turn deserts to plains, if it can scorch, it will turn snow lands to tundra. It will also attempt to sanctify hell terrain.
TEXT.Spanish: Este ordén hace que la unidad use sus hechizos para mejorar la tierra. Si tiene Manantial, cambiará los desiertos a llanuras; si puede Chamuscar, cambiará nieve a tundra. También tratará a santifica terreno de infierno.

TEXT.English: This Unit is set to autocast a spell
TEXT.French: This Unit is set to autocast a spell
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit zaubert einen Spruch automatisiert
TEXT.Italian: This Unit is set to autocast a spell
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad lanza un hechizo automáticamente

TEXT.English: Avoid angry citizens by not growing beyond the capacity for happy citizens.
TEXT.French: Avoid angry citizens by not growing beyond the capacity for happy citizens.
TEXT.German: Vermeiden wütende Bewohner indem die Stadt nicht über die Kapazität für glückliche Bürger wächst.
TEXT.Italian: Avoid angry citizens by not growing beyond the capacity for happy citizens.
TEXT.Spanish: Evitar ciudadanos enojados por no crecer fuera la capacidad de ciudadanos felices.

TEXT.English: Avoid unhealty citizens by not growing beyond the capacity for healthy citizens.
TEXT.French: Avoid unhealty citizens by not growing beyond the capacity for healthy citizens.
TEXT.German: Vermeide kranke Bewohner indem die Stadt nicht über ihre Kapazität für gesunde Bewohner wächst.
TEXT.Italian: Avoid unhealty citizens by not growing beyond the capacity for healthy citizens.
TEXT.Spanish: Evitar ciudadanos enfermizos por no crecer fuera la capacidad de ciudadanos sanos.
Dejar Libro de Hechizos de Alteración
Dejar Libro de Hechizos de Divinación
Dejar Libro de Hechizos de Elementalismo
Dejar Libro de Hechizos de Nigromancia

TEXT.English: We have found the dead body of a heroic adventurer. What shall we do?
TEXT.French: We have found the dead body of a heroic adventurer. What shall we do?
TEXT.German: Wir haben den Körper eines Toten Abenteurers gefunden. Was sollen wir tun?
TEXT.Italian: We have found the dead body of a heroic adventurer. What shall we do?
TEXT.Spanish: Hemos encontrado el cuerpo muerto de un aventurero heroico. ¿Qué haremos?

TEXT.English: Build a great monument in the Capital so that his deeds will not be forgotten
TEXT.French: Build a great monument in the Capital so that his deeds will not be forgotten
TEXT.German: Baue im ein großes Monument in der Hauptstadt so dass seine Taten nicht vergessen werden
TEXT.Italian: Build a great monument in the Capital so that his deeds will not be forgotten
TEXT.Spanish: Edificar un monumento en el Capital así sus trabajos no serán olvidados.

TEXT.English: Command him to rise from the dead
TEXT.French: Command him to rise from the dead
TEXT.German: Befehle ihm von den Toten aufzuerstehen
TEXT.Italian: Command him to rise from the dead

TEXT.English: Interrogate a local bard about him
TEXT.French: Interrogate a local bard about him
TEXT.German: Frage einen örtlichen Barden nach ihm aus
TEXT.Italian: Interrogate a local bard about him
TEXT.Spanish: Interrogue un bardo local de él.

TEXT.English: Slayed by Animals? That's no Hero!
TEXT.French: Slayed by Animals? That's no Hero!
TEXT.German: Von Tieren umgebracht? Das ist kein Held!
TEXT.Italian: Slayed by Animals? That's no Hero!

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Press [ALT + CTRL + O] to enter The BUG Mod Options Screen.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Pressez [ALT + CTRL + O] pour accèder aux écrans d'options du BUG Mod.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Mit der Tastenkombination [STRG + ALT + O] lässt sich das Optionsmenü der BUG Mod aufrufen.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Premi [ALT + CTRL + O] per accedere alla schermata di configurazione del BUG Mod.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: Press [ALT + CTRL + O] to enter The BUG Mod Options Screen.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Ever forget to build that Barracks? [ALT +M] -OR- [ALT + CTRL + R] will allow you to set up reminders so you don't forget again!
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Oublié de construire une Caserne? [ALT +M] -OU- [ALT + CTRL + R] vous permet de créer une alerte pour que vous ne l'oublierez plus jamais!
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Mit den Tastenkombinationen [ALT + M] oder [STRG + ALT + R] lassen sich Erinnerungen verfassen, die nach einer festgelegten Anzahl Runden wieder erscheinen.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Ti dimentichi sempre di costruire le caserme? [ALT +M] -O- [ALT + CTRL + R] ti permette di inserire un promemoria in modo da non dimenticartene più!
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: Ever forget to build that Barracks? [ALT +M] -OR- [ALT + CTRL + R] will allow you to set up reminders so you don't forget again!

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: [ALT + S] allows you to make Sticky Notes on tiles. Just click and type. Pressing [ALT + S] again, and then clicking on an existing note will remove it.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: [ALT + S] vous permet de mettre un signe sur une case. Il suffit de cliquer et de typer. Pressez [ALT + S] de nouveau et puis cliquer sur un signe existant l'enlèvera.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Mit der Tastenkombination [ALT + S] lassen sich Haftnotizen an Geländefeldern anbringen. Eine Haftnotiz lässt sich mit derselben Tastenkombination auch wieder entfernen.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: [ALT + S] ti consente di inserire note nelle caselle. Devi solo cliccarci e scrivere. Premendo nuovamente [ALT + S] e cliccando su una nota esistente, la si rimuove.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: [ALT + S] allows you to make Sticky Notes on tiles. Just click and type. Pressing [ALT + S] again, and then clicking on an existing note will remove it.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: To cancel all Worker Orders quickly, select 1 worker with orders, and while holding the [ALT] key, click the cancel orders button.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Pour annuler tous les ordres des Ouvriers, sélectionnez 1 ouvrier avec des ordres, et en gardant [ALT] enfoncé, cliquez le bouton pour annuler les ordres.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Bei gedrückter [ALT]-Taste lassen sich die Missionen aller aktiven Bautrupps per Mausklick auf das Abbrechensymbol eines aktiven Bautrupps abbrechen.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Per cancellare velocemente tutti gli ordini dei lavoratori, selezionane uno che abbia ordini attivi, tieni premuto il tasto [ALT] e clicca il pulsante di cancellazione degli ordini.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: To cancel all Worker Orders quickly, select 1 worker with orders, and while holding the [ALT] key, click the cancel orders button.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: [ALT + E] will allow you to make a custom Event in the autologger.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: [ALT + E] vous permet d'ajouter une entrée customisée dans l'autologger.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Mit der Tastenkombination [ALT + E] können dem Protokoll eigene Einträge hinzugefügt werden.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: [ALT + E] ti consente di inserire un evento personalizzato nel registro automatico.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: [ALT + E] will allow you to make a custom Event in the autologger.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Clicking on the Scroll button within the Domestic Advisor will allow you to customize it to your playing style.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Cliquer sur le parchemin dans l'adviseur domestique vous permet de le customiser comme vous le désirez.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Mit einem Klick auf die gelbe Schriftrolle im "Inlandsberater" lässt sich dieser an den eigenen Spielstil anpassen.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Cliccare sul pulsante con la pergamena nella schermata del Consigliere Interno ti permetterà di personalizzarlo in base al tuo stile di gioco.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: Clicking on the Scroll button within the Domestic Advisor will allow you to customize it to your playing style.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: To create rally points, select the city, or cities, you are building units it, hold down the [SHIFT] key and Right Click on the tile you want your rally point to be at. You will see a yellow circle showing the rally point.[NEWLINE]To cancel orders select the same city or cities, [SHIFT] and Right click on any city square, and it will cancel the rally orders.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Pour créer des points de rassemblement, sélectionnez la ville ou les villes où vous construisez vos unités, gardez [SHIFT] enfoncé et cliquez avec le bouton de droite sur la case où vous voulez que vos unités aillent. Un cercle jaune indiquera le point de rassemblement.[NEWLINE]Pour annuler cet ordre, sélectionnez la même ville, gardez [SHIFT] enfoncé et cliquez avec le bouton de droite et cliquez sur une case de ville.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Bei gedrückter [UMSCHALT]-Taste in Verbindung mit einem Rechtsklick lässt sich für eine oder mehrere Städte ein Sammelpunkt für Einheiten setzen. Der Sammelpunkt wird durch einen gelben Kreis markiert. Wird bei gedrückter [UMSCHALT]-Taste in Verbindung mit einem Rechtsklick ein Stadtgeländefeld ausgewählt, lässt sich der Sammelpunkt wieder aufheben.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Per creare punti di raduno, seleziona la città (o le città) in cui stai costruendo le unità, tieni premuto il tasto Maiusc e clicca col destro sulla casella dove vuoi collocare il punto di raduno. Vedrai un cerchio giallo indicare il punto di raduno.[NEWLINE]Per cancellare il punto di raduno, seleziona la stessa (o le stesse) città, tieni premuto il tasto Maiusc e clicca col destro su una qualunque casella cittadina.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: To create rally points, select the city, or cities, you are building units it, hold down the [SHIFT] key and Right Click on the tile you want your rally point to be at. You will see a yellow circle showing the rally point.[NEWLINE]To cancel orders select the same city or cities, [SHIFT] and Right click on any city square, and it will cancel the rally orders.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: When a tile is in the City Cross of two different cities, you can change its ownership by clicking on that tile from the chosen city's City Screen.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Quand une case est dans la Croix de Ville de plusieures villes, vous pouvez changez la ville à laquelle la case appartient en cliquant dessus dans l'écran de ville de la ville choisie.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Befindet sich ein Geländefeld im Einzugsbereich zweier Städte, lässt sich dessen Zugehörigkeit festlegen, indem es im Stadt-Bildschirm der betreffenden Stadt per Mausklick ausgewählt wird.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Quando una casella appartiene all'area cittadina di due diverse città, puoi cambiare la sua appartenenza cliccando su di essa dalla Schermata Cittadina della città a cui vuoi che appartenga.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: When a tile is in the City Cross of two different cities, you can change its ownership by clicking on that tile from the chosen city's City Screen.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: When you're weak there is no shame in giving into rivals demands. This will give you time to build your defenses as you enjoy the short boost in attitude between your nations.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Il n'y a pas de déshonneur à accèder aux demandes de vos rivaux quand vous êtes faible. Ceci vous permettra de renforcer vos défenses pendant le temps qui vous profitez des relations améliorées de vos nations.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Es ist keine Schande, in einer unterlegenen Position den Forderungen von stärkeren Gegnern nachzukommen. Die durch die kurze Verbesserung der diplomatischen Beziehungen gewonnene Zeit kann genutzt werden, um die eigenen Verteidigungslinien zu verstärken.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Quando sei debole, non c'è vergogna nell'accettare le pretese dei rivali. Ti concederà il tempo necessario per costruire le tue difese nel conseguente breve periodo di miglioramento dei rapporti fra le vostre nazioni.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: When you're weak there is no shame in giving into rivals demands. This will give you time to build your defenses as you enjoy the short boost in attitude between your nations.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: When at War, use fast moving units to pillage strategic resources such as Bronze, or Iron first, and leave a sentry to prevent the enemy from reconnecting that resource.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Pendant une Guerre, utilisez des unités rapides pour piller les ressources stratégiques comme le Fer ou l'Aluminium, et laissez-y une sentinelle pour éviter que votre ennemi ne reconnecte la ressource.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Während eines Krieges sollten schnelle Einheiten genutzt werden, um zuerst strategische Ressourcen, wie Eisen oder Aluminium, zu plündern. Nachrückende Einheiten können dann deren Bewachung übernehmen, um dem Gegner den Zugang zu diesen Ressourcen dauerhaft zu verwehren.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Quando sei in guerra, utilizza le unità che si muovono velocemente per depredare le risorse strategiche, e lascia sul posto una sentinella per evitare che il nemico le recuperi.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: When at War, use fast moving units to pillage strategic resources such as Bronze, or Iron first, and leave a sentry to prevent the enemy from reconnecting that resource.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Save your promotions for when your unit is injured to speed up healing, and when you promote, tailor your unit for the type of enemy you are facing.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Attendez pour promouvoir une unité pour le moment ou elle a besoin de soins. Quand vous promovez, choisissez les promotions en fonction de l'ennemi que vous encontrez.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Eine verfügbare Beförderung muss einer Einheit nicht sofort verliehen werden. Manchmal lohnt es sich zu warten, um im passenden Moment die bestgeeignete Beförderung und Bonusfähigkeit zu wählen. Eine Beförderung wirkt auf verletzte Einheiten übrigens heilsam.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Risparmia le promozioni per accelerare la cura quando le tue unità vengono ferite, e quando le promuovi, ottimizza le tue unità contro il tipo di nemico che stai affrontando.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: Save your promotions for when your unit is injured to speed up healing, and when you promote, tailor your unit for the type of enemy you are facing.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Always have siege equipment before attacking a city. A Swordsman can do more damage entering through a hole in the wall, then trying to climb over it with arrows raining down from above.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: N'attaquez pas une ville sans machines de siège. Un Spadassin peut faire plus de dégats en rentrant par une brèche dans la muraille, qu'en essayant de l'escalader sous une pluie de flèches.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Für die Einnahme einer größeren Stadt sollten genügend Belagerungswaffen zur Verfügung stehen, um die Verteidigungsanlagen niederzureißen und die Verteidiger zu schwächen.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Procurati sempre l'equipaggiamento d'assedio prima di assediare una città. Uno Spadaccino può fare più danni entrando da un buco nelle mura, che cercando di scavalcarle sotto una pioggia di frecce.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: Always have siege equipment before attacking a city. A Swordsman can do more damage entering through a hole in the wall, then trying to climb over it with arrows raining down from above.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Examine what resources are available before researching worker techs.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Examinez quelles ressources sont à votre disposition avant de choisir une technologie à rechercher.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Bevor Technolgien erforscht werden, die die Fähigkeiten der Bautrupps erweitern, sollte zunächst das Umland erkundet werden, um die dort verfügbaren Ressourcen möglichst schnell erschließen und nutzen zu können.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Esamina quali risorse sono disponibili prima di ricercare le tecnologie dei lavoratori.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: Examine what resources are available before researching worker techs.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Always escort your Settlers. It's mighty dangerous out in the Wilderness.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Escortez toujours vos Colons. La nature peut être très dangereuse.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Wertvolle Einheiten ohne nennenswerte Verteidigungsfähigkeiten, wie Siedler und Galeonen, können leicht Opfer von Angriffen werden und verdienen deshalb auf fremdem Terrain einen Begleitschutz.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Scorta sempre i tuoi Coloni. E' molto pericoloso vagare per le Terre Selvagge (specialmente quelle inesplorate).
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: Always escort your Settlers. It's mighty dangerous out in the Wilderness.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Play to your Civilization's traits, and specialize your Empire. No use being Charismatic and Aggressive and never starting a war.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Utilisez les Traits de votre Civilisation et spécialisez votre Empire. Que vaut être Charismatique et Aggressif si vous ne partez pas en guerre?
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Der eigene Spielstil sollte sich an den Eigenschaften des gewählten Staatsoberhaupts orientieren und die eigene Zivilisation entsprechend spezialisiert werden. Die Eigenschaften "Charismatisch" und "Aggressiv" nützen wenig, wenn keine Kriege beabsichtigt sind.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Sfrutta le caratteristiche della tua Civiltà, e specializza il tuo Impero. E' inutile essere Carismatico ed Aggressivo e non iniziare neppure una guerra.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: Play to your Civilization's traits, and specialize your Empire. No use being Charismatic and Aggressive and never starting a war.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Selling resources that you no longer use, such as copper or iron, can pay off nicely over the long run.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Vendre des ressources que vous n'utilisez plus, comme le Cuivre ou le Fer, peut être très profitable. Veillez juste que vous les vendez à un ami plus faible que vous!
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Der Verkauf von zwischenzeitlich unbrauchbaren Ressourcen, wie Kupfer oder Eisen, kann langfristig vorteilhaft sein, wenn der Käufer ein momentan noch schwacher Verbündeter ist.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Vendere le risorse che non usi più, come Rame e Ferro, può rendere parecchio a lungo termine. Però assicurati di venderle ad una nazione amica più debole!
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: Selling resources that you no longer use, such as copper or iron, can pay off nicely over the long run.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Don't neglect your Diplomacy! Pay attention to the Alerts that pop up, telling you what is available out there.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Ne négligez pas votre Diplomatie! Faites attention aux Alertes qui arrivent et qui vous informent de ce qui est disponible.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Die Diplomatie sollte nicht vernachlässigt werden. Während einer Partie erscheinen ständig Meldungen, die die verfügbaren Handelswaren anderer Zivilisationen anzeigen.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Non trascurare la Diplomazia! Fai attenzione agli avvisi che compaiono per dirti cosa c'è di disponibile in giro.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: Don't neglect your Diplomacy! Pay attention to the Alerts that pop up, telling you what is available out there.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Be the first to circle the globe, and your Naval Units all receive +1 movement.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Soyez le premier à naviguer autour du globe, et tous vos Unités Navales recevront +1 en mouvement.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Die Marineeinheiten der Zivilisation, die als erste die Welt umrundet, erhalten einen Bewegungsbonus von +1.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Circunnaviga il globo per primo, e tutte le tue Unità Navali presenti e future riceveranno un bonus di +1 al loro movimento.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: Be the first to circle the globe, and your Naval Units all receive +1 movement.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Animals can't enter your land, so it can be worth the risk to leave your city undefended and use your warrior for early exploration.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Les Animaux ne peuvent pas entrer en votre territoire. Vous pouvez donc prendre le risque de laisser votre ville sans défense et d'aller explorer avec votre Guerrier au début du jeu.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Tiere können die Grenzen von Städten nicht überschreiten. Deshalb kann es sinnvoll sein, ein Risiko einzugehen und Städte zunächst unbewacht zu lassen, um mit den ersten Kriegern die Welt schon früh zu erkunden.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Gli animali non possono entrare nel tuo territorio, perciò nele prime fasi del gioco può valere la pena di correre il rischio di lasciare la tua città indifesa e utilizzare il tuo Guerriero per una esplorazione preliminare.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: Animals can't enter your land, so it can be worth the risk to leave your city undefended and use your warrior for early exploration.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Form trade relations with nations that get along with each other to avoid an attitude penalty.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Formez des relations commerciales avec des nations qui s'agréent entre eux, pour éviter des pénalités diplomatiques.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Zwischen ähnlichen Zivilisationen sollten Handelsverbindungen geknüpft werden, um einen Diplomatiemalus zu vermeiden.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Stabilisci relazioni mercantili con nazioni che vanno d'accordo per evitare penalità nei rapporti.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: Form trade relations with nations that get along with each other to avoid an attitude penalty.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: If you neglect your military, and your power becomes weak, a neighbor WILL attack you.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Si vous négligez votre armée et que votre pouvoir décline, un de vos voisins vous attaquera sûrement!
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Das Militär sollte nicht vernachlässigt werden. Eine schwache Zivilisation wird gern von benachbarten Zivilisationen angegriffen.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Se trascuri il tuo esercito, e la tua potenza si indebolisce, un paese confinante ti attaccherà sicuramente.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: If you neglect your military, and your power becomes weak, a neighbor WILL attack you.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Station naval units near your water based resources, and put them on Sea Patrol to protect your resources.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Stationnez des unités navales près de vos ressources aquatiques, et faites les Patrouiller pour les protéger.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Marineeinheiten sollten in der Nähe von Meeres-Ressourcen stationiert und mit dem Auftrag "Seepatrouille" versehen werden, um diese zu verteidigen.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Disloca le tue unità navali vicino alle tue risorse acquatiche e mettile di pattuglia per proteggerle.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: Station naval units near your water based resources, and put them on Sea Patrol to protect your resources.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: When selling Technologies, shop around for the highest bidder, and then work your way down.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Quand vous vendez des Technologies, essayez d'abord de les vendre à celui qui vous payera le plus.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Beim Technologiehandel sollten die Angebote verschiedener Oberhäupter verglichen werden, um dann dem höchsten Bieter den Zuschlag zu geben.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Quando ti appresti a vendere Tecnologie, prima non dimenticare di controllare chi te le pagherà di più.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: When selling Technologies, shop around for the highest bidder, and then work your way down.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Watch your neighbors' civics changes. A change from Free Religion to Theology could mean an arms build-up.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Gardez un oeuil sur les changements de Doctrine de vos voisins. Un changement de Liberté de Culte vers Théologie peut indiquer l'assemblement d'une armée.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Ein Wechsel der Staatsform in einer benachbarten Zivilisation sollte aufmerksam verfolgt werden. Es könnte die Vorbereitung auf einen Krieg sein.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Tieni d'occhio i cambiamenti di forma di governo dei tuoi vicini. Un cambiamento da Libertà Religiosa a Teologia può significare un aumento di aggressività.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: Watch your neighbors' civics changes. A change from Free Religion to Theology could mean an arms build-up.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Speak softly and carry a big stick, and you will go far.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Parlez doucement et portez un gros bâton, et vous irez loin.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Anregungen und Hinweise zur "BUG Mod" können bei civfanatics.com im dortigen Forum hinterlassen werden.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: Poche parole e un grosso bastone ti porteranno lontano.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: Speak softly and carry a big stick, and you will go far.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Sometimes it's better to stop a Scout or Explorer on a forest, hill, or jungle tile and losing the extra movement in favor of safety.
TEXT.French: *Conseils du BUG*: Parfois il vaut mieux arrêter un Eclaireur ou un Explorateur sur une fôret, une montagne ou une jungle et perdre un peu de mouvement pour gagner en sécurité.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Es kann sinnvoll sein, einen Späher oder Kundschafter eine Runde auf einem Wald-, Hügel- oder Dschungel-Geländefeld beenden zu lassen, um die überschüssigen Bewegungspunkte gegen größere Sicherheit einzutauschen.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del BUG Team*: A volte è meglio fermare un Esploratore su una casella di collina, foresta o giungla e perdere il movimento extra in favore della prudenza.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: Sometimes it's better to stop a Scout or Explorer on a forest, hill, or jungle tile and losing the extra movement in favor of safety.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Never go up against a Sheaim Priest or an Aristrakh Vampire Lord when death is on the line.
TEXT.French: *BUG Hint*: Never go up against a Sheaim Priest or an Aristrakh Vampire Lord when death is on the line.
TEXT.German: [BUG] Tipp... Das Team der BUG Mod dankt Ihnen für Ihr Vertrauen und hofft, dass die Mod Ihnen genauso viel Spaß macht, wie wir bei ihrer Entwicklung hatten!
TEXT.Italian: *BUG Hint*: Never go up against a Sheaim Priest or an Aristrakh Vampire Lord when death is on the line.
TEXT.Spanish: *BUG Hint*: Never go up against a Sheaim Priest or an Aristrakh Vampire Lord when death is on the line.

TEXT.English: The Flanking promotion only allows a unit to withdraw when near death, so it may help to leave these units a movement point to run away to safety if they do withdraw from an attack.
TEXT.French: The Flanking promotion only allows a unit to withdraw when near death, so it may help to leave these units a movement point to run away to safety if they do withdraw from an attack.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Flankenangriffs-Eigenschaften sind nur bei Angriffen wirksam, zudem müssen die angreifenden Einheiten noch über einen freien Bewegungspunkt verfügen, um sich im Falle einer drohenden Niederlage zurückziehen zu können.
TEXT.Italian: The Flanking promotion only allows a unit to withdraw when near death, so it may help to leave these units a movement point to run away to safety if they do withdraw from an attack.
TEXT.Spanish: The Flanking promotion only allows a unit to withdraw when near death, so it may help to leave these units a movement point to run away to safety if they do withdraw from an attack.

TEXT.English: Consider keeping one unit with the Medic promotion in every large stack-the bonus isn't cumulative, but it can make the difference in keeping an advance going. Disciple class units are the only ones who begin with this promotion, and no one else can learn it. (The Grigori Civilization can build medics instead.)
TEXT.French: Pensez à garder une unité avec la promotion Médecin dans les grandes piles d'unités - le bonus n'est pas cumulatif, mais il peut faire la différence pour garder de l'avance.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Ein größerer Einheitenverband profitiert von einem Sanitäter - besonders wenn es gegen Belagerungswaffen geht, die einen Verband auf breiter Front schwächen können. Geweihte Einheiten beginnen als Einzige mit dieser Beförderung, die andere Einheitenklassen nicht erlernen können. (Das Reich der Grigori kann stattdessen Heiler aufstellen.)
TEXT.Italian: Consider keeping one unit with the Medic promotion in every large stack-the bonus isn't cumulative, but it can make the difference in keeping an advance going. Disciple class units are the only ones who begin with this promotion, and no one else can learn it. (The Grigori Civilization can build medics instead.)
TEXT.Spanish: Considera guardar una unidad con el ascenso Médico en cada pila grande de unidades... la bonificación no es acumulativa, pero puede marcar la diferencia al mantener el avance. Las unidades clase discípulo son las únicas que empiezan con este ascenso, y nadie más puede aprenderlo. (La Civilización Grigori pueden crear médicos en su lugar.)

TEXT.German: Ermöglicht Bogenschützen und einigen anderen Einheiten Fernangriffe durchzuführen

TEXT.Spanish: Permite que el Arquero y unas otras unidades golpeen de alcance

TEXT.English: At game start most raw mana nodes are converted to other mana nodes
TEXT.French: At game start most raw mana nodes are converted to other mana nodes
TEXT.German: Beim Spielstart werden die meisten Manaknoten in Mana verwandelt
TEXT.Italian: At game start most raw mana nodes are converted to other mana nodes
TEXT.Spanish: Al comienzo del juego, la mayoridad de nodos crudos de mana se convierte a otros nodos de mana

TEXT.English: Wild Mana nodes have Guardians, who spawn Minions and channel the magic energy of the node[NEWLINE]Includes all effects of the Wild Mana Gameoption
TEXT.French: Wild Mana nodes have Guardians, who spawn Minions and channel the magic energy of the node[NEWLINE]Includes all effects of the Wild Mana Gameoption
TEXT.German: wildes Mana hat Verteidiger, welche über Magische ihres Manaknotens verfügen und Diener beschwören können[NEWLINE]Diese Option beinhaltet alle Effekte der wildes Mana Spieloption
TEXT.Italian: Wild Mana nodes have Guardians, who spawn Minions and channel the magic energy of the node[NEWLINE]Includes all effects of the Wild Mana Gameoption
TEXT.Spanish: Nodos de mana salvaje tienen Guardianes, que generan lacayos y canalizar la energia mágico del nudo[NEWLINE]Incluye todos los efectos de la opción de Wildmana.

TEXT.English: Also makes invisible units within 2 tiles visible.
TEXT.French: Also makes invisible units within 2 tiles visible.
TEXT.German: zudem werden unsichtbare Einheiten im Radius von 2 Feldern sichtbar.
TEXT.Italian: Also makes invisible units within 2 tiles visible.
TEXT.Spanish: También hace que unidades invisibles dentro de 2 cuadrados se devengan visible.

TEXT.English: Creates a Tree of Life building in city that provides +10 Food, +5 Health and +5 Happiness. Units created in city start with the Touch of Life promotion.
TEXT.French: Creates a Tree of Life building in city that provides +10 Food, +5 Health and +5 Happiness. Units created in city start with the Touch of Life promotion.
TEXT.German: Creates a Tree of Life building in city that provides +10 Food, +5 Health and +5 Happiness. Units created in city start with the Touch of Life promotion.
TEXT.Italian: Creates a Tree of Life building in city that provides +10 Food, +5 Health and +5 Happiness. Units created in city start with the Touch of Life promotion.
TEXT.Spanish: Crea un Árbol de Vida en la ciudad que proveer de +10 Comida, +5 Salud y +5 Felicidad. Unidades creados en esta ciudad empiece con la promoción de Toca de Vida.

TEXT.English: Use the Holy Avenger to smite forces of darkness.
TEXT.French: Use the Holy Avenger to smite forces of darkness.
TEXT.German: Use the Holy Avenger to smite forces of darkness.
TEXT.Italian: Use the Holy Avenger to smite forces of darkness.
TEXT.Spanish: Utilice el Vengador Santo para golpear las fuerzas de las tinieblas.

TEXT.English: Available only to those that have mastered all 4 elements, the Shooting Stars spell summons stars of energy that the caster can hurl at their enemies.
TEXT.French: Available only to units that have mastered all 4 elements, the Shooting Stars spell summons stars of energy that the caster can hurl at their enemies.
TEXT.German: Available only to units that have mastered all 4 elements, the Shooting Stars spell summons stars of energy that the caster can hurl at their enemies.
TEXT.Italian: Available only to units that have mastered all 4 elements, the Shooting Stars spell summons stars of energy that the caster can hurl at their enemies.
TEXT.Spanish: Disponible solamente a las unidades que han dominado todos los 4 elementos, el hechizo de la Estrella Fugaz envoca estrellas de energía que el mago puede lanzar a sus enemigos.

TEXT.English: Collateral damage: 60% up to 90% max, affects 2 units.
TEXT.French: Collateral damage: 60% up to 90% max, affects 2 units.
TEXT.German: Collateral damage: 60% up to 90% max, affects 2 units.
TEXT.Italian: Collateral damage: 60% up to 90% max, affects 2 units.
TEXT.Spanish: Daños colaterales: 60% a 90% máximum, aflige 2 unidades.

TEXT.English: The Tree of Life can cast the Tree of Life spell in cities to provide certain bonuses.
TEXT.French: The Tree of Life can cast the Tree of Life spell in cities to provide certain bonuses.
TEXT.German: The Tree of Life can cast the Tree of Life spell in cities to provide certain bonuses.
TEXT.Italian: The Tree of Life can cast the Tree of Life spell in cities to provide certain bonuses.
TEXT.Spanish: El Árbol de Vida puede hacer el hechizo de Árbol de Vida en las ciudades para proveer ciertos pluses.

TEXT.English: A Vyrkul is an ancient wizard who transformed himself into an elemental king through rituals that have long been lost in the sands of time. He can only be summoned by those with an unprecedented knowledge of the elements and the arcane.
TEXT.French: A Vyrkul is an ancient wizard who transformed himself into an elemental king through rituals that have long been lost in the sands of time. He can only be summoned by those with an unprecedented knowledge of the elements and the arcane.
TEXT.German: A Vyrkul is an ancient wizard who transformed himself into an elemental king through rituals that have long been lost in the sands of time. He can only be summoned by those with an unprecedented knowledge of the elements and the arcane.
TEXT.Italian: A Vyrkul is an ancient wizard who transformed himself into an elemental king through rituals that have long been lost in the sands of time. He can only be summoned by those with an unprecedented knowledge of the elements and the arcane.
TEXT.Spanish: Un Vyrkul es un mago anciano quien se transformó al rey elemental por rituales que se han perdido en la arena de tiempo. Solamente uno con un conocimiento sin precedente de los elementos y el arcano puede evocarlo.

TEXT.English: It takes 7 turns to summon a Vyrkul.
TEXT.French: It takes 7 turns to summon a Vyrkul.
TEXT.German: It takes 7 turns to summon a Vyrkul.
TEXT.Italian: It takes 7 turns to summon a Vyrkul.
TEXT.Spanish: Se necesita 7 turnos para evocar un Vyrkul.
Se permite acceso a los Hechizos de Creación.
Se permite acceso a los Hechizos de Fuerza.
Se permite acceso a los Hechizos de Hielo.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Force and Creation Nodes require Wildmana Gameoption and cannot be build on raw mana nodes.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Force and Creation Nodes require Wildmana Gameoption and cannot be build on raw mana nodes.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Kraft und Schöpfungsknoten setzen die Spieloption wildes Mana voraus und können nicht auf raw mana Knoten gebaut werden.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Force and Creation Nodes require Wildmana Gameoption and cannot be build on raw mana nodes.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Nodos de Fuerza y Creación necesitan la opción de Wildmana y no se puede ser construido en los nudos crudos de mana.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Ice Nodes require Wildmana Gameoption and cannot be build on raw mana nodes.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Ice Nodes require Wildmana Gameoption and cannot be build on raw mana nodes.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Kraft und Schöpfungsknoten setzen die Spieloption wildes Mana voraus und können nicht auf raw mana Knoten gebaut werden.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Ice Nodes require Wildmana Gameoption and cannot be build on raw mana nodes.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Nodos de Hielo necesitan la opción de Wildmana y no se puede ser construido en los nudos crudos de mana.

TEXT.English: "They say that knowledge is power. This is true." He paused for a moment, allowing the fact to weigh on the minds of the initiates. [PARAGRAPH:1]"That is not all that knowledge is however - it is our history and our heritage, our past and our future. Within the walls of this archive are records dating back before the Ice, transcripts and accounts of the bloodiest of battles, the musings of the greatest minds and the tales of the most legendary bards. You will spend a lifetime within these walls and see yet a fraction of the wonders they contain. Yet the fraction you do see will shape the person you are to become..." [PARAGRAPH:1] -- Einon Logos, addressing initiates in the Archive of Cahir Abbey

[PARAGRAPH:1]"No es todo que conocimientos son, sin embargo - it is our history and our heritage, our past and our future. Within the walls of this archive are records dating back before the Ice, transcripts and accounts of the bloodiest of battles, the musings of the greatest minds and the tales of the most legendary bards. You will spend a lifetime within these walls and see yet a fraction of the wonders they contain. Yet the fraction you do see will shape the person you are to become..." TEXT.English: foggy blue mountain range[NEWLINE]sun setting in purple[NEWLINE]like in a painting[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]pointed rooftops[NEWLINE]light meals[NEWLINE]quiet gardening[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]in the sky ravens[NEWLINE]wind chimes within reach[NEWLINE]of my hand[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]where depression is no[NEWLINE]depression[NEWLINE]but philosophy[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]and sadness[NEWLINE]no sadness[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]But what if[NEWLINE]the gardens[NEWLINE]were taken over[NEWLINE]by noisy memories[NEWLINE]and sadness[NEWLINE]were just different[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE] -- Ela Zawrat, Evening in a Monastery

TEXT.English: Before the Altar, bowed, he stands[NEWLINE]With empty hands;[NEWLINE]Upon it perfumed offerings burn[NEWLINE]Wreathing with smoke the sacrificial urn.[NEWLINE]Not one of all these has he given,[NEWLINE]No flame of his has leapt to Heaven[NEWLINE]Firesouled, vermilion-hearted,[NEWLINE]Forked, and darted,[NEWLINE]Consuming what a few spare pence[NEWLINE]Have cheaply bought, to fling from hence[NEWLINE]In idly-asked petition.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]His sole condition[NEWLINE]Love and poverty.[NEWLINE]And while the moon[NEWLINE]Swings slow across the sky,[NEWLINE]Athwart a waving pine tree,[NEWLINE]And soon[NEWLINE]Tips all the needles there[NEWLINE]With silver sparkles, bitterly[NEWLINE]He gazes, while his soul[NEWLINE]Grows hard with thinking of the poorness of his dole.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]"Shining and distant Goddess, hear my prayer[NEWLINE]Where you swim in the high air![NEWLINE]With charity look down on me,[NEWLINE]Under this tree,[NEWLINE]Tending the gifts I have not brought,[NEWLINE]The rare and goodly things[NEWLINE]I have not sought.[NEWLINE]Instead, take from me all my life![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]"Upon the wings[NEWLINE]Of shimmering moonbeams[NEWLINE]I pack my poet's dreams[NEWLINE]For you.[NEWLINE]My wearying strife,[NEWLINE]My courage, my loss,[NEWLINE]Into the night I toss[NEWLINE]For you.[NEWLINE]Golden Divinity,[NEWLINE]Deign to look down on me[NEWLINE]Who so unworthily[NEWLINE]Offers to you:[NEWLINE]All life has known,[NEWLINE]Seeds withered unsown,[NEWLINE]Hopes turning quick to fears,[NEWLINE]Laughter which dies in tears.[NEWLINE]The shredded remnant of a man[NEWLINE]Is all the span[NEWLINE]And compass of my offering to you.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]"Empty and silent, I[NEWLINE]Kneel before your pure, calm majesty.[NEWLINE]On this stone, in this urn[NEWLINE]I pour my heart and watch it burn,[NEWLINE]Myself the sacrifice; but be[NEWLINE]Still unmoved: Divinity."[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]From the altar, bathed in moonlight,[NEWLINE]The smoke rose straight in the quiet night.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] -- Amy Lowell, Before the Altar

TEXT.Italian: Before the Altar, bowed, he stands[NEWLINE]With empty hands;[NEWLINE]Upon it perfumed offerings burn[NEWLINE]Wreathing with smoke the sacrificial urn.[NEWLINE]Not one of all these has he given,[NEWLINE]No flame of his has leapt to Heaven[NEWLINE]Firesouled, vermilion-hearted,[NEWLINE]Forked, and darted,[NEWLINE]Consuming what a few spare pence[NEWLINE]Have cheaply bought, to fling from hence[NEWLINE]In idly-asked petition.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]His sole condition[NEWLINE]Love and poverty.[NEWLINE]And while the moon[NEWLINE]Swings slow across the sky,[NEWLINE]Athwart a waving pine tree,[NEWLINE]And soon[NEWLINE]Tips all the needles there[NEWLINE]With silver sparkles, bitterly[NEWLINE]He gazes, while his soul[NEWLINE]Grows hard with thinking of the poorness of his dole.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]"Shining and distant Goddess, hear my prayer[NEWLINE]Where you swim in the high air![NEWLINE]With charity look down on me,[NEWLINE]Under this tree,[NEWLINE]Tending the gifts I have not brought,[NEWLINE]The rare and goodly things[NEWLINE]I have not sought.[NEWLINE]Instead, take from me all my life![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]"Upon the wings[NEWLINE]Of shimmering moonbeams[NEWLINE]I pack my poet's dreams[NEWLINE]For you.[NEWLINE]My wearying strife,[NEWLINE]My courage, my loss,[NEWLINE]Into the night I toss[NEWLINE]For you.[NEWLINE]Golden Divinity,[NEWLINE]Deign to look down on me[NEWLINE]Who so unworthily[NEWLINE]Offers to you:[NEWLINE]All life has known,[NEWLINE]Seeds withered unsown,[NEWLINE]Hopes turning quick to fears,[NEWLINE]Laughter which dies in tears.[NEWLINE]The shredded remnant of a man[NEWLINE]Is all the span[NEWLINE]And compass of my offering to you.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]"Empty and silent, I[NEWLINE]Kneel before your pure, calm majesty.[NEWLINE]On this stone, in this urn[NEWLINE]I pour my heart and watch it burn,[NEWLINE]Myself the sacrifice; but be[NEWLINE]Still unmoved: Divinity."[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]From the altar, bathed in moonlight,[NEWLINE]The smoke rose straight in the quiet night.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] -- Amy Lowell, Before the Altar

but be[NEWLINE]Still unmoved: Divinity."[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]From the altar, bathed in moonlight,[NEWLINE]The smoke rose straight in the quiet night.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] -- Amy Lowell, Before the Altar

TEXT.English: The Minster of the Elohim is a major project to complete, with significant rewards both to the city and civilization-wide. It also allows your high level Monk units to gain significant bonuses.
TEXT.French: The Minster of the Elohim is a major project to complete, with significant rewards both to the city and civilization-wide. It also allows your high level Monk units to gain significant bonuses.
TEXT.German: Das Münsetr der Elohim ist ein großes Projekt, mit deutlichen Belohnungen sowohl für die Stadt als auch die gesamte Bevölkerung. Es erlaubt Euren hochstufigen Mönchen den Erhalt signifikanter Boni.
TEXT.Italian: The Minster of the Elohim is a major project to complete, with significant rewards both to the city and civilization-wide. It also allows your high level Monk units to gain significant bonuses.'
TEXT.Spanish: The Minster of the Elohim is a major project to complete, with significant rewards both to the city and civilization-wide. It also allows your high level Monk units to gain significant bonuses.

TEXT.English: Construction of an Abbey cannot be started before a number of Monasteries are completed. Once this requirement is met however, the Abbey allows considerable upgrades to your more experienced Monk units.
TEXT.French: Construction of an Abbey cannot be started before a number of Monasteries are completed. Once this requirement is met however, the Abbey allows considerable upgrades to your more experienced Monk units.
TEXT.German: Die Errichtung einer Abtei kann nicht ohne die vorherige Fertigstellung einer gewissen Zahl von Klostern begonnen werden. Ist diese Voraussetzung jedoch einmal erfüllt, erlaubt die Abtei beachtliche Aufwertungen Eurer erfahrenen Mönche.
TEXT.Italian: Construction of an Abbey cannot be started before a number of Monasteries are completed. Once this requirement is met however, the Abbey allows considerable upgrades to your more experienced Monk units.'
TEXT.Spanish: Construction of an Abbey cannot be started before a number of Monasteries are completed. Once this requirement is met however, the Abbey allows considerable upgrades to your more experienced Monk units.

TEXT.English: Bow down my soul in worship very low[NEWLINE]And in the holy silences be lost.[NEWLINE]Bow down before the marble man of woe,[NEWLINE]Bow down before the singing angel host.[NEWLINE]What jewelled glory fills my spirit's eye,[NEWLINE]What golden grandeur moves the depths of me![NEWLINE]The soaring arches lift me up on high[NEWLINE]Taking my breath with their rare symmetry.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Bow down my soul and let the wondrous light[NEWLINE]Of beauty bathe thee from her lofty throne,[NEWLINE]Bow down before the wonder of man's might.[NEWLINE]Bow down in worship, humble and alone;[NEWLINE]Bow lowly down before the sacred sight[NEWLINE]Of man's divinity alive in stone. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] -- Claude McKay

[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] -- Claude McKay

TEXT.English: The sunlight on the garden[NEWLINE]Hardens and grows cold,[NEWLINE]We cannot cage the minute[NEWLINE]Within its nets of gold;[NEWLINE]When all is told[NEWLINE]We cannot beg for pardon.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Our freedom as free lances[NEWLINE]Advances towards its end;[NEWLINE]The earth compels, upon it[NEWLINE]Sonnets and birds descend;[NEWLINE]And soon, my friend,[NEWLINE]We shall have no time for dances.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The sky was good for flying[NEWLINE]Defying the church bells[NEWLINE]And every evil iron[NEWLINE]Siren and what it tells:[NEWLINE]The earth compels,[NEWLINE]We are dying, friends, dying[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]And not expecting pardon,[NEWLINE]Hardened in heart anew,[NEWLINE]But glad to have sat under[NEWLINE]Thunder and rain with you,[NEWLINE]And grateful too[NEWLINE]For sunlight on the garden.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] -- Sunlight on the Garden, Louis MacNeice
